response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be a perfect match for your needs. Considering its exceptional quality and benefits, we're offering it to you at a special price of $11,500. We're confident this offer will allow us to share the value of this product with you while ensuring a fair return for us. We look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 11500}
